MsgDepositValidatorRewardsPool.title: Msg Deposit Validator Rewards Pool
MsgDepositValidatorRewardsPool.description: DepositValidatorRewardsPool defines the request structure to provide additional rewards to delegators from a specific validator.

cosmos.base.v1beta1.Coin.title: Coin
cosmos.base.v1beta1.Coin.description: Coin defines a token with a denomination and an amount. NOTE: The amount field is an Int which implements the custom method signatures required by gogoproto.
